title: Denmark
desc:
Post 1128
- While you own this, you must rp being a viking.
- While you own this, You may draw a <:weapon:1107519313075785768> card once every 2 turns. You may instead draw a specific <:weapon:1107519313075785768> card and wait 4 turns before you can again.
- You have a drinking problem. Skip a turn constructing a mead hall. Every 5 turns you host a massive drinking party that everyone must attend. Anyone may play any cards relating to alcohol or food for free on their turn. Execpt for you. Your turn is skipping while hosting a drinking party.
- If you hate someone, you may play a card that targets them with a negitive ability for free once per turn.
- You hate Sweden [1126]
